name: And then there was the word.
name_original: And then there was the word.
description:
At the beginning there was nothing...

And then, out of the nothingness, the first glimpse of something - moving one square to the right.

This game is a game about programming a being in this developing world, and to make it survive through the different levels this game offers. The programming language you get to use, NothingScript, is a full programming language with a syntax similar to C or Java, with support for lambda functions - if you don't know what that means, don't fret, this game is accessible to people new to programming as well.

Due to time constraints, some features couldn't be realized, such as multiplayer or more levels. We hope you enjoy the game regardless!

Made by  42triangles   and me.
